mods.abstract: Two color window cards (black on yellow) announcing a Gospel Concert featuring Jerry Goof and the Singing Goffs, the Gospel Harmony Boys, Faith, and One Way Singers. Poster features a metal photoplate of Jerry Goff and the Singing Goffs. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/39157.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
